amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to develop strategies for identifying, addressing, preventing, and mitigating discriminatory actions or decisions based on political affiliation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Peters.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Peters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
